title: Tuesday Sector Laggards: Auto Parts, Specialty Retail Stocks - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Tuesday, auto parts shares were relative laggards, down on the day by about 3.5%. Helping drag down the group were shares of Commercial Vehicle Group ( CVGI  ), off about 9.3% and shares of Cooper-Standard Holdings ( CPS  ) off about 9.2% on the day.      Also lagging the market Tuesday are specialty retail shares, down on the day by about 3.4% as a group, led down by Signet Jewelers ( SIG  ), trading lower by about 9.6% and Barnes & Noble Education ( BNED  ), trading lower by about 7.4%.  makeArticleAd();      VIDEO: Tuesday Sector Laggards: Auto Parts, Specialty     Retail Stocks
